constraints.name: max_min_diff_sum
constraints.description: 将序列划分为 k 个连续子序列，每个子序列的最大值和最小值之差的和最大化
constraints.formal: maximize Σ(max(A[i:j]) - min(A[i:j])) for all partitions of A into k consecutive subarrays

constraints.name: consecutive_subarrays
constraints.description: 每个划分部分必须包含至少一个元素且是连续的
constraints.formal: for each partition, A[i:j] where j - i + 1 >= 1 and A[i:j] is a contiguous subarray
